text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump Funny how all DJT talks about is the economy, in the midst of COVID-19 and George Scott demonstrations, yet McCarthy complains about the highest economic gain in our economy, the totally legal pot industry, much of which comes out of his own district.
